body: Gotcha.  I think includes (/I) are pretty straightforward.  Is there any instruction that specifies which link options are necessary for Windows?  https://www.tensorflow.org/extend/adding_an_op#compile_the_op_using_your_system_compiler_tensorflow_binary_installation port for Windows.
